entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
